sn48.68:1: "Bhikkhus, just as, among the trees of the Tāvatiṁsa devas the coral tree[n.243]Pārichattaka.I follow PED, though Liyanaratne explains thekiṁsukaas the coral tree ("South Asian Flora as Reflected in the Abhidhanappadipika," §43). According to PED, thepārichattakaisErythmia indica,but it is questionable whether the celestial trees mentioned here and in the next two suttas correspond to actual botanical species. See PED for references.is declared to be their chief, so too, among the states conducive to enlightenment the faculty of wisdom is declared to be their chief, that is, for the attainment of enlightenment.
